text: raj_koothrappali Okay , if no - one else will say it , I will . We really suck at paintball .
howard_wolowitz That was absolutely humiliating .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , come on , some battles you win , some battles you lose .
howard_wolowitz Yes , but you do n't have to lose to Kyle Bernstein 's Bar - Mitzvah party .
leonard_hofstadter I think we have to acknowledge , those were some fairly savage pre - adolescent Jews .
sheldon_cooper You know , we were annihilated by our own incompetence and the inability of some people to follow the chain of command .
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon , let it go .
sheldon_cooper No , I want to talk about the fact that Wolowitz shot me in the back .
howard_wolowitz I shot you for good reason , you were leading us into disaster .
sheldon_cooper I was giving clear , concise orders .
leonard_hofstadter You hid behind a tree yelling ' get the kid in the yarmulkah , get the kid in the yarmulkah . '
penny Oh , hey guys .
leonard_hofstadter Hello Penny .
howard_wolowitz Morning ma'am .
penny So , how was paintball , did you have fun ?
sheldon_cooper Sure , if you consider being fragged by your own troops fun . You clear space on your calendar , there will be an enquiry .
penny Okay , um , oh hey , I 'm having a party on Saturday so if you guys are around you should come by .
leonard_hofstadter A party ?
penny Yeah .
howard_wolowitz A boy - girl party ?
penny Well , there will be boys , and there will be girls , and it is a party . So , it 'll just be a bunch of my friends , we 'll have some beer , do a little dancing ... .
sheldon_cooper Dancing ?
leonard_hofstadter Yeah , I do n't know , Penny ... .
sheldon_cooper The thing is , we 're not ... .
leonard_hofstadter We 're really more ... .
sheldon_cooper No .
leonard_hofstadter But thanks , thanks for thinking of us .
penny Are you sure ? Come on , it 's Halloween .
sheldon_cooper A Halloween party ?
howard_wolowitz As in , costumes ?
penny Well , yeah .
leonard_hofstadter Is there a theme ?
penny Um , yeah , Halloween .
sheldon_cooper Yes , but are the costumes random , or genre specific ?
penny As usual , I 'm not following .
leonard_hofstadter He 's asking if we can come as anyone from science - fiction , fantasy ... .
penny Sure .
sheldon_cooper What about comic - books ?
penny Fine .
sheldon_cooper Anime ?
penny Of course .
sheldon_cooper TV , film , D&D , Manga , Greek Gods , Roman Gods , Norse Gods ... .
penny Anything you want , okay ? Any costume you want . Bye .
howard_wolowitz Gentlemen , to the sewing machines .
leonard_hofstadter I 'll get it .
howard_wolowitz Bjow .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , no .
sheldon_cooper Oh no !
raj_koothrappali Make way for the fastest man alive . Oh no !
sheldon_cooper See , this is why I wanted to have a costume meeting .
leonard_hofstadter We all have other costumes , we can change .
raj_koothrappali Or , we could walk right behind each other all night and look like one person going really fast .
howard_wolowitz No , no , no , it 's a boy - girl party , this Flash runs solo .
leonard_hofstadter Okay , how about this , nobody gets to be The Flash , we all change , agreed ?
all@ Agreed .
leonard_hofstadter I call Frodo !
all@ Damn !
raj_koothrappali Hey . Sorry I 'm late , but my hammer got stuck in the door on the bus .
leonard_hofstadter You went with Thor ?

raj_koothrappali What ? Just because I 'm Indian I ca n't be a Norse God ? No , no , no , Raj has to be an Indian God . That 's racism . I mean , look at Wolowitz , he 's not English , but he 's dressed like Peter Pan . Sheldon is neither sound nor light , but he 's obviously the Doppler Effect .
howard_wolowitz I 'm not Peter Pan , I 'm Robin Hood .
raj_koothrappali Really , because I saw Peter Pan , and you 're dressed exactly like Cathy Rigby . She was a little bigger than you , but it 's basically the same look , man .
leonard_hofstadter Hey , Sheldon , there 's something I want to talk to you about before we go to the party .
sheldon_cooper I do n't care if anybody gets it , I 'm going as the Doppler Effect .
leonard_hofstadter No , it 's not ... .
sheldon_cooper If I have to , I can demonstrate . Neeeeoooowwwww !
leonard_hofstadter Terrific . Um , this party is my first chance for Penny to see me in the context of her social group , and I need you not to embarrass me tonight .
sheldon_cooper Well , what exactly do you mean by embarrass you ?
leonard_hofstadter For example , tonight no - one needs to know that my middle name is Leakey .
sheldon_cooper Well , there 's nothing embarrassing about that , your father worked with Lewis Leakey , a great anthropologist . It had nothing to do with your bed - wetting .

leonard_hofstadter All I 'm saying is that this party is the perfect opportunity for Penny to see me as a member of her peer group . A potential close friend and ... perhaps more . I do n't want to look like a dork .
howard_wolowitz Just a heads up fellas , if anyone gets lucky I 've got a dozen condoms in my quiver .
penny Oh , hey guys .
leonard_hofstadter Hey , sorry we 're late .
penny Late ? It 's 7 .
sheldon_cooper And you said the party starts at seven .
penny Well , yeah , when you start a party at seven , no - one shows up at , you know , seven .
sheldon_cooper It 's 7 .
penny Yes . Yes it is . Okay , well , um , come on in .
howard_wolowitz What , are all the girls in the bathroom ?
penny Probably , but in their own homes .
sheldon_cooper So what time does the costume parade start ?
penny The parade ?
sheldon_cooper Yeah , so the judges can give out the prizes for best costume , you know , most frightening , most authentic , most accurate visual representation of a scientific principle .
penny Oh , Sheldon , I 'm sorry but there are n't going to be any parades or judges or prizes .
sheldon_cooper This party is just going to suck .
penny No , come on , it 's going to be fun , and you all look great , I mean , look at you , Thor , and , oh , Peter Pan , that 's so cute .
leonard_hofstadter Actually , Penny , he 's Rob ... .
howard_wolowitz I 'm Peter Pan ! And I 've got a handful of pixie dust with your name on it .
penny No you do n't . Oh , hey , what 's Sheldon supposed to be .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , he 's the Doppler Effect .
sheldon_cooper Yes . It 's the apparent change in the frequency of a wave caused by relative motion between the source of the wave and the observer .
penny Oh , sure , I see it now , the Doppler Effect . Alright , I 've got to shower , you guys um , make yourselves comfortable .
leonard_hofstadter Okay .
sheldon_cooper See , people get it .
raj_koothrappali Mmmm , by Odin 's beard , this is good Chex Mix .
howard_wolowitz No thanks , peanuts , I ca n't afford to swell up in these tights .
sheldon_cooper I 'm confused . If there 's no costume parade , what are we doing here ?
leonard_hofstadter We 're socialising . Meeting new people .
sheldon_cooper Telepathically ?
penny Oh hey , when did you get here , Hi !
raj_koothrappali Penny is wearing the worst Catwoman costume I have ever seen , and that includes Halle Berry 's .
leonard_hofstadter She 's not Catwoman , she 's just a generic cat .
sheldon_cooper And that 's the kind of sloppy costuming which results from a lack of rules and competition .
howard_wolowitz Hey guys , check out the sexy nurse . I believe it 's time for me to turn my head and cough .
raj_koothrappali What is your move ?
howard_wolowitz I 'm going to use the mirror technique . She brushes her hair back , I brush my hair back , she shrugs , I shrug , subconsciously she 's thinking we 're in sync , we belong together .
leonard_hofstadter Where do you get this stuff ?
howard_wolowitz You know , psychology journals , internet research , and there 's this great show on VH1 about how to pick up girls .
raj_koothrappali Oh , if only I had his confidence . I have such difficulty speaking to women . Or around women . Or at times , even effeminate men .
howard_wolowitz If that 's a working stethoscope , maybe you 'd like to hear my heart skip a beat .
nurse_costume_girl No thanks .
howard_wolowitz No , seriously , you can , I have transient arrhythmia .
leonard_hofstadter I to get to know Penny 's friends , I just , I do n't know how to talk to these people .
sheldon_cooper Well , I actually might be able to help .
leonard_hofstadter How so ?
sheldon_cooper Like Jane Goodall observing the apes , I initially saw their interactions as confusing and unstructured , but patterns emerge , they have their own language if you will .
leonard_hofstadter Go on .
sheldon_cooper Well , it seems that the newcomer approaches the existing group with the greeting ' How wasted am I ? ' which is met with an approving chorus of ' Dude . '
leonard_hofstadter Then what happens ?
sheldon_cooper That 's as far as I 've gotten .
leonard_hofstadter This is ridiculous , I 'm jumping in .
sheldon_cooper Good luck .
leonard_hofstadter No , you 're coming with me .
sheldon_cooper Oh , I hardly think so .
leonard_hofstadter Come on .
sheldon_cooper Are n't you afraid I 'll embarrass you ?
leonard_hofstadter Yes . But I need a wing - man .
sheldon_cooper Alright , but if we 're going to use flight metaphors I 'm much more suited to being the guy from the FAA , analyzing wreckage .
girl_in_hippie_costume Oh , Hi !
leonard_hofstadter Hi .
sheldon_cooper Hello .
girl So , what are you supposed to be ?
sheldon_cooper Me ? I 'll give you a hint . Neeeeooooowwwww !
girl Uh , a choo - choo train ?
sheldon_cooper Close ! Neeeeeoooooowwwww !
girl A brain damaged choo - choo train ?
butterfly_girl How wasted am I ?
sheldon_cooper Neeeeeooooowwwwww !
girl I still do n't get it .
sheldon_cooper I 'm the Doppler Effect .
girl Okay , if that is some sort of learning disability , I think it 's very insensitive .
leonard_hofstadter Why do n't you just tell people you 're a zebra ?
sheldon_cooper Well , why do n't you just tell people you 're one of the seven dwarves .
leonard_hofstadter Because I 'm Frodo .
sheldon_cooper Yes , well , I 'm the Doppler Effect .
leonard_hofstadter Oh no .
sheldon_cooper What ?
leonard_hofstadter That 's Penny 's ex - boyfriend .
sheldon_cooper What do you suppose he 's doing here ? Besides disrupting the local gravity field .
leonard_hofstadter If he were any bigger , he 'd have moons orbiting him .
sheldon_cooper Oh , snap . So I guess we 'll be leaving now .
leonard_hofstadter Why should we leave ? For all we know , he crashed the party and Penny does n't even want him here . .
sheldon_cooper You have a back - up hypothesis .
leonard_hofstadter Maybe they just want to be friends .
sheldon_cooper Or maybe she wants to be friends , and he wants something more .
leonard_hofstadter Then he and I are on equal ground .
sheldon_cooper Yes , but you 're much closer to it than he is .
leonard_hofstadter Look , if this was 15,000 years ago , by virtue of his size and strength , Kurt would be entitled to his choice of female partners .
sheldon_cooper And male partners . Animal partners . Large primordial eggplants , pretty much whatever tickled his fancy .
leonard_hofstadter Yes , but our society has undergone a paradigm shift , in the information age , Sheldon , you and I are the alpha males . We should n't have to back down .
sheldon_cooper True . Why do n't you text him that and see if he backs down ?
leonard_hofstadter No . I 'm going to assert my dominance face to face .
sheldon_cooper Face to face ? Are you going to wait for him to sit down , or are you going to stand on a coffee table ?
leonard_hofstadter Hello Penny . Hello Kurt .
penny Oh , hey guys . You having a good time ?
sheldon_cooper Given the reaction to my costume , this party is a scathing indictment of the American education system .
kurt What , you 're a zebra , right ?
sheldon_cooper Yet another child left behind .
kurt And what are you supposed to be , an Elf ?
leonard_hofstadter No , I 'm a Hobbit .
kurt What 's the difference ?
leonard_hofstadter Uh , a Hobbit is a mortal Halfling inhabitant of Middle Earth , whereas an Elf is an immortal tall warrior .
kurt So why the hell would you want to be a Hobbit ?
sheldon_cooper Because he is neither tall nor immortal , and none of us could be The Flash .
kurt Well , whatever , why do n't you go hop off on a quest , I 'm talking to Penny here .
leonard_hofstadter I think we 're all talking to Penny here .
sheldon_cooper I 'm not . No offence .
kurt Okay , maybe you did n't hear me , go away .
penny Alright Kurt , be nice .
kurt Aw , I am being nice . Right little buddy .
penny Kurt !
leonard_hofstadter Okay , I understand your impulse to try to physically intimidate me . I mean , you ca n't compete with me on an intellectual level and so you 're driven to animalistic puffery .
kurt Are you calling me a puffy animal ?
penny Of course not , no , he 's not , you 're not , right Leonard ?
leonard_hofstadter No , I said animalistic . Of course we 're all animals , but some of us have climbed a little higher on the evolutionary tree .
sheldon_cooper If he understands that , you 're in trouble .
kurt So what , I 'm unevolved ?
sheldon_cooper You 're in trouble .
kurt You know , you use a lot of big words for such a little dwarf .
penny Okay , Kurt , please .

leonard_hofstadter No , Penny , it 's okay , I can handle this . I 'm not a dwarf , I 'm a Hobbit . A Hobbit . Are misfiring neurons in your hippocampus preventing the conversion from short - term to long - term memory ?
kurt Okay , now you 're starting to make me mad .
leonard_hofstadter A homo - habilis discovering his opposable thumbs says what ?
kurt What ?
leonard_hofstadter I think I 've made my point .
kurt Yeah , how about I make a point out of your pointy little head .
sheldon_cooper Let me remind you , while my moral support is absolute , in a physical confrontation I will be less than useless .
leonard_hofstadter There 's not going to be a confrontation , in fact I doubt if he can even spell confrontation .
kurt C - O - N ... frontation !
penny Kurt , put him down this instant .
kurt He started it .
penny I do n't care , I 'm finishing it , put him down .
kurt Fine . You 're one lucky little leprechaun .
sheldon_cooper He 's a Hobbit ! I 've got your back .
penny Leonard , are you okay .
leonard_hofstadter Yeah , no , I 'm fine . It 's good , it 's a good party , thanks for having us , it 's just getting a little late so ... .
penny Oh , okay , alright , well thank you for coming .
sheldon_cooper Happy Halloween . If it 's any consolation , I thought that homo - habilus line really put him in his place .
leonard_hofstadter What 's that ?
sheldon_cooper Tea . When people are upset the cultural convention is to bring them hot beverages . There there . You want to talk about it ?
leonard_hofstadter No .
sheldon_cooper Good . There there was really all I had .
leonard_hofstadter Good night Sheldon .
sheldon_cooper Good night Leonard .
penny Hey Leonard .
leonard_hofstadter Hi Penny .
penny Hey , I just wanted to make sure you 're okay .
leonard_hofstadter I 'm fine .
penny I 'm so sorry about what happened .
leonard_hofstadter It 's not your fault .
penny Yes it is . That 's why I broke up with him , he always does stuff like that .
leonard_hofstadter So why was he at your party ?

penny Well , I ran into him last week and , he was ... . just , all apologetic , about how he 's changed , he was just going on and on and I believed him , and I 'm an idiot because I always believe guys like that and ... . I ca n't go back to my party because he 's there , and I know you do n't want to hear this and I 'm upset and I 'm really drunk and I just want to ... .
leonard_hofstadter There there .
penny God , what is wrong with me .
leonard_hofstadter Nothing , you 're perfect .
penny Gah , I 'm not perfect .
leonard_hofstadter Yes you are .
penny You really think so , do n't you ?
leonard_hofstadter Penny ?
penny Yeah .
leonard_hofstadter How much have you had to drink tonight ?
penny Just ... a lot .
leonard_hofstadter Are you sure that your being drunk , and your being angry with Kurt does n't have something to do with what 's going on here ?
penny It might . Boy , you 're really smart .
leonard_hofstadter Yeah , I 'm a frickin ' genius .
penny Leonard , you are so great . Why ca n't all guys be like you ?
leonard_hofstadter Because if all guys were like me , the human race could n't survive .
penny I should probably go .
leonard_hofstadter Probably .
penny Thank you .
leonard_hofstadter That 's right , you saw what you saw . That 's how we roll in The Shire .
sheldon_cooper Coming .
howard_wolowitz Hey , have you seen Koothrappali ?
sheldon_cooper He 's not here . Maybe the Avenger summoned him .
howard_wolowitz He 's not the Marvel comic story , he 's the original Norse God .
sheldon_cooper Thank you for the clarification .
howard_wolowitz I 'm supposed to give him a ride home .
sheldon_cooper Well I 'm sure he 'll be fine . He has his hammer .
butterfly_girl Wow , I have to say , you are an amazing man . You 're gentle and passionate , and my God , you are such a good listener !
